basic.floral_language:
Echeveria 'Moon Fairy' 
Floriography: self-reliant, confident, pure
Is a classical and grand succulent plant, with fleshy leaves in a rosette, leaf surface covered by a layer of white powders, with adequate sunlight, leaf edges turn pink, like a little fairy. 
Likes sunlight. Flowers sometimes with a scape forming in the middle of the plant, flowers are orange color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, orange flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, with adequate sunlight, lower leaf edges turning to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, not afraid of strong sunlight, when in a short period of dormancy in summer, reduce water and shade properly
maintenance.watering: Do not water frequently, keep a dry environment, water every 10-15 days
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered and dead leaves and excessive daughter plants
